item.title: Come Take AR Photos with Amber!
item.description: Use your phone to scan the QR code, then snap a photo with Amber and solve the puzzle!
item.content:encoded:
Use your phone to scan the QR code, then snap a photo with Amber and solve the puzzle!

Read more on Come Take AR Photos with Amber!

item.title: "A Sea of Lights" Fan Art Event - Event Details
item.description: Liyue's Lantern Rite festival will soon be upon us, and the "A Sea of Lights" fan art event is right around the corner! Post your work for the chance to be richly rewarded with Primogems, as well a year's subscription to Adobe All Apps, CLIP STUDIO PAINT and Adobe Photoshop!
item.content:encoded:
Liyue's Lantern Rite festival will soon be upon us, and the "A Sea of Lights" fan art event is right around the corner! Post your work for the chance to be richly rewarded with Primogems, as well a year's subscription to Adobe All Apps, CLIP STUDIO PAINT and Adobe Photoshop!

Read more on "A Sea of Lights" Fan Art Event - Event Details

item.title: Light five kinds of Xiao Lanterns to share in the Grand Primogem Prize! The "Wish Upon a Lantern" web event has officially begun!
item.description: Legend has it that these lanterns will carry the wishes of the people to the adepti. The web event "Wish Upon a Lantern" has begun!
item.content:encoded:
Legend has it that these lanterns will carry the wishes of the people to the adepti. The web event "Wish Upon a Lantern" has begun!

Read more on Light five kinds of Xiao Lanterns to share in the Grand Primogem Prize! The "Wish Upon a Lantern" web event has officially begun!

item.title: The Genshin Impact Version Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch has started. Live stream your content, complete missions, and earn Primogems!

item.title: Engraved Wishes
item.description: The first anniversary of Genshin Impact is approaching. Click the link below to send your Wishes and you will have the opportunity to engrave your own message on Paimon's blocks.
item.content:encoded:
The first anniversary of Genshin Impact is approaching. Click the link below to send your Wishes and you will have the opportunity to engrave your own message on Paimon's blocks.

Read more on Engraved Wishes

item.title: Genshin Impact Raffle Event
item.description: To thank everyone for their constant support and companionship, Paimon has specially prepared a raffle event that you can take part in by sharing posts. During the event, share this post for a chance to win great rewards~
item.content:encoded:
To thank everyone for their constant support and companionship, Paimon has specially prepared a raffle event that you can take part in by sharing posts. During the event, share this post for a chance to win great rewards~

Read more on Genshin Impact Raffle Event

item.title: The "Aloy's Exploration Journal" Web Event has begun, explore the land of Teyvat together with Aloy to obtain rewards!
item.description: When Aloy sets foot on Teyvat, what kind of adventure will this Savior from Another World experience? Dear Traveler, please open "Aloy's Exploration Journal" to start the adventure!
item.content:encoded:
When Aloy sets foot on Teyvat, what kind of adventure will this Savior from Another World experience? Dear Traveler, please open "Aloy's Exploration Journal" to start the adventure!

Read more on The "Aloy's Exploration Journal" Web Event has begun, explore the land of Teyvat together with Aloy to obtain rewards!

item.title: [Event Result Announcement] Genshin Impact Raffle Event
item.description: Thank you very much for taking part in the Genshin Impact Raffle Event. Congratulations to the lucky winners! Hurry up and check out the list of winners, because the brightest star might be you ～(•̀ᴗ•́)و ̑̑

item.title: Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch
item.description: The Genshin Impact Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" update arrived on October 13. The Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch has also started. Live stream your content, complete missions and earn Primogems!
item.content:encoded:
The Genshin Impact Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" update arrived on October 13. The Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch has also started. Live stream your content, complete missions and earn Primogems!

Read more on Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch

item.title: "Meeting of Light and Shadow" Co-Op Photo Submission Contest
item.description: During the event, you can post your original Co-Op photographs that meet the event submission criteria on Twitter, and you will be considered a successful participant.
item.content:encoded:
During the event, you can post your original Co-Op photographs that meet the event submission criteria on Twitter, and you will be considered a successful participant.

Read more on "Meeting of Light and Shadow" Co-Op Photo Submission Contest

item.title: Web Event "Yummy! Barbecue Under the Stars" Now Online: Grill fish with Shiki Taishou to earn Primogems and other rewards
item.description: A dancing campfire by the seaside at night~ Hurry and come grill some fish with Shiki Taishou, Traveler!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: "A Thousand Questions With Paimon" Quiz Event Now Open!
item.description: A new challenge with new goals! Take part in the Paimon Quiz Event from HoYoLAB each day and answer questions correctly to win Mora!
item.content:encoded:
